name: COMPILED_ATTRIBUTION_DATA
description: This table holds the External Identifier Bundles and attributed providers for which attribution data was compiled.

columns.name: ASGN_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the assignment data record record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CM_PHY_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this record or line. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: CM_LOG_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance from which this record or line was extracted. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: ATTR_PROV_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of the attributed provider for this compiled attribution period.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTED_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the provider record for this compiled provider attribution period. .

columns.name: ATTRIBUTION_PERIOD_EFF_DATE
columns.description: The start date of the compiled provider attribution period.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTION_PERIOD_TERM_DATE
columns.description: The end date of the compiled provider attribution period.
